heading: Forgotten Ruins Dungeon Guide
content: Forgotten Ruins features a fairly linear layout and benign mob types, making it relatively safe and easy to clear. Having to slay all monsters in the first section is a con for this dungeon, though, taking it off the list of preferable farming locations. This dungeon unlocks the , a solid defensive option for bleed-based barbarians. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
